Name: On My Own
About the game: Test your survival ingenuity in four unique biomes—Woodland, Woodland Lake, Alpine Tundra, & Mountain—, all while imbibing charming pixel art, chill music, and thought-provoking quotes along the way. Explore & Survive Each biome contains unique flora, fauna, and challenges. Players will need to hunt, trap, and gather to survive. Crafting System Combine gathered items by trial and error to produce tools that aid in survival. Strategic Survival Stay warm and well fed in any season by stocking up, making smart decisions, and crafting key items. Unfolding Mystery Who built the abandoned shelters and left behind letters containing survival clues? And why? Inspired Music Repeat-worthy instrumental tracks written to capture the spirit of each biome. Informative Journal Learn interesting facts about the flora, fauna, and tools you interact with. Literary Quotes Ponder the thoughts of some of America’s best 19th- and 20th-century writers, philosophers, and poets during the nighttime loading screen. Beautiful World & User Interface Retro pixel art in delightful hues pair with contemporary game effects and design.
